Research Papers

  1. Got Many Labels? Deriving Topic Labels from Multiple Sources for Social Media Posts using Crowdsourcing and Ensemble Learning
    Shuo Chang, Peng Dai, Jilin Chen, Ed H. Chi
    International World Wide Web Conference (WWW), 2015
  2. Using Groups of Items for Preference Eliciation in Recommender Systems
    Shuo Chang, Max Harper, Loren Terveen
    ACM Conference on Computer-Supported Cooperative Work and Social Computing (CSCW), 2015
  3. 'I LOVE THIS SITE!'' vs. 'It's a little girly': Perceptions of and Initial User Experience with Pinterest
    Hannah Miller, Shuo (Steven) Chang, Loren Terveen
    ACM Conference on Computer-Supported Cooperative Work and Social Computing (CSCW), 2015
  4. Specialization, Homophily, and Gender in a Social Curation Site: Findings from Pinterest.
    Shuo Chang, Vikas Kumar, Eric Gilbert, Loren Terveen
    ACM Conference on Computer-Supported Cooperative Work and Social Computing (CSCW), 2014
  5. Routing Questions for Collaborative Answering in Community Question Answering
    Shuo Chang, Aditya Pal
    IEEE/ACM International Conference on Advances in Social Networks Analysis and Mining (ASONAM), 2013
    Best Full Paper Award
  6. 'I Need to Try This!': A Statistical Overview of Pinterest
    Eric Gilbert, Saeideh Bakhshi, Shuo Chang and Loren Terveen
    SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems(CHI), 2013
  7. Evolution of Experts in Question Answering Communities
    Aditya Pal, Shuo Chang and Joseph A. Konstan
    International AAAI Conference on Weblogs and Social Media(ICWSM), 2012
  8. Demonstration of Spectral Defragmentation in Flexible Bandwidth Optical Networking by FWM
    David J. Geisler, Yawei Yin, Ke Wen, Nicolas K. Fontaine, Ryan P. Scott, Shuo Chang, S. J. B. Yoo
    IEEE Photonics Technology Letters, Vol. 23, No. 24, pp. 1893- 1895, December, 2011.
